Technology.Name: Iridium Power Cells
Technology.LongDescription: Iridium has proven itself the superior element for power storage purposes. This technology switches all of your empire's fuel cells to the Iridium standard, increasing fuel cell efficiency by a total of 50%.

UnlockedBonus.Name: Fuel Cell Upgrade
UnlockedBonus.Description: Increase empire-wide bonus to fuel cell capacity to 50%
